---

## Site URL
The base URL of the VPS provider (e.g., `https://example.com/`)

## Site Type
- [ ] WHMCS-based
- [ ] Custom storefront / SPA
- [ ] Other (explain below)

## Does it Require Cloudflare Bypass?
- [ ] Yes
- [ ] No
- [ ] Not sure

## Product Listing URL
Direct URL to the product listing page (if different from base URL).

## Additional Details
Any additional info about the site structure, special authentication, or parsing needs.
